courses.description: Intersection of algorithms and economic theory, using machine learning models to analyze dynamic marketplaces and agent decision making

courses.description: Why we have environmental problems like pollution & global warming and how to solve them under a microeconomic lens

courses.description: Using economic statistical principles to solve complex problems

courses.name: Money and Banking
courses.description: Study the role of money in the economic system emphasizing monetary policy and theory
